name: test_e2e_with_logs[020_SQLI_BLIND_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BLIND_001` |
| **Name** | Character-by-character blind extraction |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT SUBSTRING(version(),1,1))='5' --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20SUBSTRING%28version%28%29%2C1%2C1%29%29%3D%275%27%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~42000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:46:02.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_001-1769334362362-9jg3qw pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_001 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20SUBSTRING%28version%28%29%2C1%2C1%29%29%3D%275%27%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
